fields.descriptive_content: Waterproof Terry Towelling Breathable Mattress Protector - {{size}} Bed.
fields.factory_description: Pure Cotton Pile Waterproof Mattress Protector {{ factory_size }} (Towelling)
fields.sage_description: {{ sage_size }} BEDDING SPECIALIST TOWELLING MAT. PRO. (95)
fields.bullet_point_1: Luxury fitted waterproof towelling mattress protector. .
fields.bullet_point_2: Pure cotton pile with soft breathable waterproof underside - Protects against liquid spills.
fields.bullet_point_3: Provides a barrier between the sleeper and the bacteria & allergens which can build up in mattresses  .
fields.bullet_point_4: Machine washable at 95°C - Stretch polyester skirt for a secure fit.
fields.bullet_point_5: Helps create a healthier and more hygienic sleeping environment.
fields.manufacturer_description:
Luxury pure cotton pile with breathable waterproof underside.

Soft and absorbent surface.

Many waterproof protectors are impervious which causes clamminess and discomfort. Ours ensures both comfort and protection, while providing a shield against the dust mites and bacteria which are known to live in the average mattress.

Elasticated stretch skirting ensures a snug fit.

fields.descriptive_content: Luxury Egyptian Cotton Mattress Topper - {{size}} Bed.
fields.sage_description: {{ sage_size }} BEDDING SPECIALIST EGYPTIAN COTTON TOPPER
fields.material: Cotton top cover hollow fibre filling.
fields.bullet_point_1: Luxury Egyptian Cotton cover with environmentally friendly antibacterial hollow fibre filling.
fields.bullet_point_2: Proven to inhibit dust mites and certain moulds and bacteria - a major cause of allergens.
fields.bullet_point_3: Promotes a healthy & hygienic sleeping environment - soft and comfortable to sleep on.
fields.bullet_point_4: Luxury quilted cover protects and prolongs the life of your mattress.
fields.bullet_point_5: Elasticated skirt for secure fit. Machine washable.
fields.manufacturer_description:
Luxurious Egyptian cotton topper with soft environmentally friendly antibacterial hollow fibre filling.

Soft and comfortable to sleep on the topper is approximately the same thickness as a summer weight duvet.

Promotes a healthy and hygienic sleeping environment.

The topper which is machine washable has elastic corner straps for a secure fit and will fit mattresses up to 40cm deep .

fields.sage_description: {{ sage_size }} BEDDING SPECIALIST P/CTN A/ALLERGY TOPPER
fields.bullet_point_1: Luxury Quilted mattress Topper with environmentally friendly anti-allergy hollow fibre filling.
fields.bullet_point_2: Proven to inhibit dust mites and certain moulds and bacteria - a major cause of allergens.
fields.bullet_point_3: Promotes a healthy & hygienic sleeping environment - soft and comfortable to sleep on.
fields.bullet_point_4: Approximately the same thickness as a summer weight duvet.
fields.bullet_point_5: Elasticated corner straps for a secure fit. Machine washable.
fields.manufacturer_description:
Luxury polycotton mattress topper with unique environmentally friendly anti-allergy / antibacterial filling

helps protect against dust mites and bacteria which are recognised as triggers for allergies such as asthma, eczema and rhinitis.

The topper is approximately the same thickness as a summer weight duvet and it's soft hollow fibre filling promotes a comfortable and hygienic sleeping environment.

The topper is machine washable and has elastic corner straps which fit mattresses up to 40cm deep .

fields.descriptive_content: Peach Soft Microfibre Mattress Topper - {{size}} Bed.
fields.sage_description: {{ sage_size }} BEDDING SPECIALIST M/FIBRE MATTRESS TOPPER (STD)
fields.material: Microfibre Cover with hollow fibre filling.
fields.bullet_point_1: Peach soft microfibre cover with deep soft hollow fibre filling.
fields.bullet_point_2: Feels very similar to luxury down.
fields.bullet_point_3: Approximately the same thickness as a summer weight duvet.
fields.bullet_point_4: Elastic corner straps for a secure fit.
fields.manufacturer_description:
Luxurious peach soft microfibre topper with soft hollow fibre filling.

The topper which has a similar feeling to a luxury down filled product is approximately the same thickness as a summer weight duvet.

It is machine washable and has elastic corner straps which fit mattresses up to 40cm deep.

fields.descriptive_content: Deep Fill  Peach soft Antibacterial  Mattress Topper - {{ size }} Bed.
fields.sage_description: {{ sage_size }} BEDDING SPECIALIST M/FIBRE MATTRESS TOPPER (XTRA)
fields.bullet_point_1: Peach soft microfibre cover with Extra deep, soft, antibacterial, hollow fibre filling.
fields.bullet_point_2: Feels very similar to luxury down.
fields.bullet_point_3: Approximately the same thickness as a winter weight duvet.
fields.bullet_point_4: Elastic corner straps for a secure fit - easy to Launder - non-allergenic.
fields.bullet_point_5: Helps promote a luxurious and hygienic sleeping environment.
fields.manufacturer_description:
Luxurious peach soft microfibre topper with extra deep soft hollow fibre filling.

The topper which is approximately the same thickness as a winter weight duvet provides a level of comfort similar to that of luxury down filled products.

The topper is machine washable and has elastic corner straps for a secure fit and is suitable for mattresses up to 40cm deep.

fields.descriptive_content: Pure Cotton Filling, Fitted Mattress Protector - {{size}} Bed.
fields.sage_description: {{ sage_size }} BEDDING SPECIALIST COTTON COVER/CTN FILL MAT.PROTECTOR
fields.material: Cotton top, underside skirt and filling.
fields.bullet_point_1: Pure Cotton quilted Cover with pure Cotton Filling, for added luxury and comfort.
fields.bullet_point_2: Percale cotton top, pure cotton underside, skirt and filling for those who desire natural products.
fields.bullet_point_3: Naturally breathable - promotes a healthy and hygienic sleeping environment.
fields.bullet_point_4: Soft, comfortable and non-allergenic. Machine washable.
fields.bullet_point_5: Elasticated skirt (35 cm deep) for a secure fit.
fields.manufacturer_description:
For those who insist on natural products you will love this luxury pure cotton mattress protector.

The percale cotton cover has pure cotton filling and the underside and 35 cm deep fitted skirt are also made of cotton.

Soft comfortable hygienic and naturally breathable.

fields.manufacturer_description:
Luxury peach soft quilted breathable waterproof mattress protector for added comfort and protection.

The products breathable qualities ensures that there is none of the clamminess associated with inferior waterproof protectors.

Luxuriously soft and comfortable the product has an elasticated fitted skirt for a secure fit and is machine washable.
